STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: if FilteredCard() ~= nil then local characteristics = FilteredCard():GetCurrentCharacteristics() if characteristics ~= nil then characteristics:Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_HEXPROOF, 1 ) end end

if FilteredCard() ~= nil then local characteristics = FilteredCard():GetCurrentCharacteristics() if characteristics ~= nil then characteristics:Power_Add( 1 ) characteristics:Toughness_Add( 1 ) end end
